fields.headline: News in brief
fields.bodyText: Flight search A new flight-price comparison service from gapyear.com checks out the lowest prices offered by four of the UK's top flight providers, updating the research on a weekly basis. Panda patrol A new conservation project launched this week by i-to-i.com offers four-week voluntary placements helping to save giant pandas at China's Shaanxi's wild animal reserve. Gourmet Cornwall There's more to Cornwall's cuisine than pasties and cream teas. The first issue of Food (food-magazine.co.uk), the new free quarterly county magazine, features Celtic beer festivals, delicatessens, local Blue cheese and Truro restaurants. Back in business Travel restrictions to Grand Cayman will be removed today following completion of the post-hurricane Ivan clean-up. Shock and awe Expect to be hit by a £3 million plus publicity blitz for travel to America, starting mid-December. With the slogan "You've Seen the Film, Now Visit the Set", the TV and billboard campaign is the first to be funded by the US government. House rescue If you're still trying to rent a large property for Christmas or New Year, salvation may lie on thebigdomain.com. The site offering houses sleeping over 12 people in the UK and abroad, still has several available including a Victorian mansion for 50 guests near Bath, a fully catered Scottish castle and an Andalucian mill. Boutique review A new Sri Lankan website, boutiquesrilanka.com, offers reviews of hotels and guesthouses no larger than 30 rooms, and can also draft a bespoke holiday itinerary.
